properties.name: spring.textencryptor.password
properties.description: The password to be used for encoding messages, using the Spring Security Crypto Module TextEncryptor.

properties.name: spring.mail.action-url
properties.description: The URL the application can be reached on. Used for linking back to the application in the email template.

properties.name: gmaps.api.server-key
properties.description: The Google Maps API key to be used server-side. This key is private - it is not used for showing maps on the page, and hence is not sent to the client. Enable the Geocoding API and Distance Matrix API for this key.

properties.name: gmaps.api.client-key
properties.description: The Google Maps API key to be used client-side. This key is public - it is used for showing maps on the page, so must be sent to the client in the page data. Enable the Maps JavaScript API for this key.
